snippet: Sachin Tendulkar of India, the top-scoring batsman in international cricket history, said he was leaving the game next month.
abstract: Sachin Tendulkar of India, the top-scoring batsman in international cricket history, announces that he is retiring from the game in November at age 40.
lead_paragraph: Sachin Tendulkar of India, the top-scoring batsman in international cricket history, said he was leaving the game next month.
